name: MazeRun (Rodrivas78)
description:
MazeRun   for MSX

 Game Instructions:

This is a two player race, in which scores whoever crosses the maze and first reaches the "end zone" of his own color (on the opposite side of the screen). Avoid touching the walls!

  Controls:

 ARROWS (keyboard) to control the GREEN player
 DIRECTIONAL PAD (joystick) to control the RED player

Tips:
  - Play in full screen.

Play it now! (link below) :

https://webmsx.org/?DISK=https://github.com/rodrivas78/MSX/raw/master/BASIC_10_Liners/Maze_Run_2020/MazeRun_2020.dsk
